title: 4th year special topics scam
content:
For 4th year they didn't allow those who took iot before to take iot special topic and we were forced to take a DIS instead. The blockchain DIS is so lengthy for just a 2 credit course. It has 60 videos.

They also cancelled crypto later and made those students take blockchain. Other DIS also were too hard.

comments.body:
You don't have to take blockchain, you can take whatever you want, even pesu courses
Edit: thanks for reminding lol I'd forgotten to edit the form
There were only 2 pesu courses which I took already and the third one I had to take blockchain as the other courses were hard and only other course that looked doable was performance engineering.
